casebody.data:
Harold G. ARON, Petitioner, v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE, Respondent. No. 11. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 18, 1935. Herman J. Galloway, of Washington, D. C. (Harold G. Aron, of New York City, of counsel), for petitioner. Frank J. Wideman, Asst. Atty. Gen., and Sewall Key and Joseph M. Jones, Sp. Assts. to Atty. Gen., for respondent.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decision affirmed.
